q1.title: What products does Sergio offer?
q1.content: We produce a variety of high-quality snacks, including corn chips, potato chips, and mixed snacks under brands like Le Rexona, Le Duxana, DoradoCorn, and GoCorn.

q2.title: Where are Sergio products made?
q2.content: All our products are proudly made in Jordan, following international quality and safety standards.

q3.title: Are Sregio products Halal certified?
q3.content: Yes, all our products are 100% Halal certified, meeting the standards of the Jordan Halal Certification.

q4.title: Do you export internationally?
q4.content: Yes, we export to several countries in the Middle East and beyond. For more details, please contact our sales team.

rightBox.title: Do you have more questions?
rightBox.description: End-to-end payments and financial management in a single solution. Meet the right platform to help realize.
